description: This is a Kotlin source file defining a RecyclerView Adapter for displaying categories with horizontal scrolling lists of videos in an Android app.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter managing a list of categories, each with a nested horizontal RecyclerView of videos, with focus and accessibility support.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter.RowVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for a category row, containing the title TextView and the nested RecyclerView for videos.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a new RowVH instance.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds category data to the ViewHolder, sets up the inner RecyclerView and its adapter.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of categories.

methods.name: requestFocusFor
methods.description: Scrolls to a specific row and column, then requests focus on the specified video item.
